job_description:
Company: FullStack Inc
Position: Software Engineer (Full Stack)
Location: Denver, CO (Hybrid)
Salary: $120,000 - $160,000

About Us:
FullStack Inc is a dynamic and innovative software development company. We create cutting-edge solutions for our clients.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Full Stack Software Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be comfortable working on both the front-end and back-end of web applications.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain both front-end and back-end components of web applications.
- Collaborate with designers and product managers to implement new features.
- Write unit and integration tests.
- Participate in code reviews.

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience in full stack development.
- Proficiency in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and SQL.
- Experience with RESTful APIs.
- Familiarity with version control systems (Git).

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with TypeScript.
- Knowledge of Docker and Kubernetes.
- Familiarity with cloud computing platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).

Benefits:
- Flexible work arrangements.
- Health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Paid time off.
